00045 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA[10] =
00046     { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','D','A','T','A' };
00047 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK[10] =
00048     { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','L','I','N','K' };

00050 namespace {
00051   struct forward_sort_clfi {
00052     bool
00053     operator()(const CommitLogFileInfo &x, const CommitLogFileInfo &y) const {
00054       return x.num < y.num;
00055     }
00056   };
00057 }

00060 CommitLog::CommitLog(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir)
00061   : CommitLogBase(log_dir) {
00062   initialize(fs, log_dir, Config::properties, 0);
00063 }
00064 
00065 CommitLog::~CommitLog() {
00066   delete m_compressor;
00067   close();
00068 }

00070 void
00071 CommitLog::initialize(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir,
00072                       PropertiesPtr &props, CommitLogBase *init_log) {
00073   String compressor;
00074   bool flush;
00075 
00076   m_fs = fs;
00077   m_log_dir = log_dir;
00078   m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00079   m_cur_fragment_num = 0;
00080   m_needs_roll = false;
00081 
00082   SubProperties cfg(props, "Hypertable.CommitLog.");
00083 
00084   HT_TRY("getting commit log properites",
00085     m_max_fragment_size = cfg.get_i64("RollLimit");
00086     compressor = cfg.get_str("Compressor");
00087     flush = cfg.get_bool("Flush"));
00088 
00089   m_flush_flag = (flush) ? Filesystem::O_FLUSH : 0;
00090 
00091   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(compressor);
00092 
00093   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash(m_log_dir);
00094 
00095   if (init_log) {
00096     stitch_in(init_log);
00097     foreach (const CommitLogFileInfo &frag, m_fragment_queue) {
00098       if (frag.num >= m_cur_fragment_num)
00099         m_cur_fragment_num = frag.num + 1;
00100     }
00101   }
00102   else {  // chose one past the max one found in the directory
00103     uint32_t num;
00104     std::vector<String> listing;
00105     m_fs->readdir(m_log_dir, listing);
00106     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00107       num = atoi(listing[i].c_str());
00108       if (num >= m_cur_fragment_num)
00109         m_cur_fragment_num = num + 1;
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113   m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00114 
00115   try {
00116     m_fs->mkdirs(m_log_dir);
00117     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00118   }
00119   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00120     HT_ERRORF("Problem initializing commit log '%s' - %s (%s)",
00121               m_log_dir.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00122     m_fd = -1;
00123     throw;
00124   }
00125 }

00128 int64_t CommitLog::get_timestamp() {
00129   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00130   boost::xtime now;
00131   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00132   return ((int64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (int64_t)now.nsec;
00133 }

00135 
00136 int CommitLog::write(DynamicBuffer &buffer, int64_t revision) {
00137   int error;
00138   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_DATA, revision);
00139 
00140   if (m_needs_roll) {
00141     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00142     if ((error = roll()) != Error::OK)
00143       return error;
00144   }
00145 
00149   if ((error = compress_and_write(buffer, &header, revision)) != Error::OK)
00150     return error;
00151 
00155   if (m_cur_fragment_length > m_max_fragment_size) {
00156     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00157     roll();
00158   }
00159 
00160   return Error::OK;
00161 }

00164 int CommitLog::link_log(CommitLogBase *log_base) {
00165   int error;
00166   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_LINK,
00167                                          log_base->get_latest_revision());
00168   DynamicBuffer input;
00169   String &log_dir = log_base->get_log_dir();
00170 
00171   if (m_needs_roll) {
00172     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00173     if ((error = roll()) != Error::OK)
00174       return error;
00175   }
00176 
00177   input.ensure(header.length());
00178 
00179   header.set_compression_type(BlockCompressionCodec::NONE);
00180   header.set_data_length(log_dir.length() + 1);
00181   header.set_data_zlength(log_dir.length() + 1);
00182   header.set_data_checksum(fletcher32(log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length()+1));
00183 
00184   header.encode(&input.ptr);
00185   input.add(log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length() + 1);
00186 
00187   try {
00188     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00189     size_t amount = input.fill();
00190     StaticBuffer send_buf(input);
00191 
00192     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, m_flush_flag);
00193     if (log_base->get_latest_revision() > m_latest_revision)
00194       m_latest_revision = log_base->get_latest_revision();
00195     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00196 
00197     roll();
00198 
00199     // Stitch in the fragment queue from the log being linked
00200     // in to the current fragment queue of the current log
00201     stitch_in(log_base);
00202 
00203   }
00204   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00205     HT_ERRORF("Problem linking external log into commit log - %s", e.what());
00206     return e.code();
00207   }
00208 
00209   return Error::OK;
00210 }

00212 
00213 int CommitLog::close() {
00214 
00215   try {
00216     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00217     if (m_fd > 0) {
00218       m_fs->close(m_fd);
00219       m_fd = -1;
00220     }
00221   }
00222   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00223     HT_ERRORF("Problem closing commit log file '%s' - %s (%s)",
00224               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what(),
00225               Error::get_text(e.code()));
00226     return e.code();
00227   }
00228 
00229   return Error::OK;
00230 }

00233 int CommitLog::purge(int64_t revision) {
00234   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00235   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00236   String fname;
00237 
00238   try {
00239 
00240     while (!m_fragment_queue.empty()) {
00241       file_info = m_fragment_queue.front();
00242       if (file_info.revision <= revision) {
00243         fname = file_info.log_dir + file_info.num;
00244         m_fs->remove(fname);
00245         m_fragment_queue.pop_front();
00246         HT_INFOF("Removed log fragment file='%s' revision=%lld", fname.c_str(),
00247                  (Lld)file_info.revision);
00248       }
00249       else {
00250         /*
00251         HT_INFOF("LOG FRAGMENT PURGE breaking because %lld >= %lld",
00252                  file_info.revision, revision);
00253         */
00254         break;
00255       }
00256     }
00257 
00258   }
00259   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00260     HT_ERRORF("Problem purging log fragment fname = '%s'", fname.c_str());
00261     return e.code();
00262   }
00263 
00264   return Error::OK;
00265 }

00267 
00268 int CommitLog::roll() {
00269   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00270 
00271   if (m_latest_revision == 0)
00272     return Error::OK;
00273 
00274   m_needs_roll = true;
00275 
00276   if (m_fd > 0) {
00277     try {
00278       m_fs->close(m_fd);
00279     }
00280     catch (Exception &e) {
00281       if (e.code() != Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE) {
00282         HT_ERRORF("Problem closing commit log fragment: %s: %s",
00283                   m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00284         return e.code();
00285       }
00286     }
00287 
00288     m_fd = -1;
00289 
00290     file_info.log_dir = m_log_dir;
00291     file_info.num = m_cur_fragment_num;
00292     file_info.size = m_cur_fragment_length;
00293     file_info.revision = m_latest_revision;
00294     file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00295     file_info.block_stream = 0;
00296 
00297     if (m_fragment_queue.empty() || m_fragment_queue.back().revision
00298         < file_info.revision)
00299       m_fragment_queue.push_back(file_info);
00300     else {
00301       m_fragment_queue.push_back(file_info);
00302       sort(m_fragment_queue.begin(), m_fragment_queue.end());
00303     }
00304 
00305     m_latest_revision = 0;
00306     m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00307 
00308     m_cur_fragment_num++;
00309     m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00310 
00311   }
00312 
00313   try {
00314     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00315   }
00316   catch (Exception &e) {
00317     HT_ERRORF("Problem rolling commit log: %s: %s",
00318               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00319     return e.code();
00320   }
00321 
00322   m_needs_roll = false;
00323 
00324   return Error::OK;
00325 }

00328 int
00329 CommitLog::compress_and_write(DynamicBuffer &input,
00330     BlockCompressionHeader *header, int64_t revision) {
00331   int error = Error::OK;
00332   EventPtr event_ptr;
00333   DynamicBuffer zblock;
00334 
00335   // Compress block and kick off log write (protected by lock)
00336   try {
00337     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00338 
00339     m_compressor->deflate(input, zblock, *header);
00340 
00341     size_t amount = zblock.fill();
00342     StaticBuffer send_buf(zblock);
00343 
00344     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, m_flush_flag);
00345     assert(revision != 0);
00346     if (revision > m_latest_revision)
00347       m_latest_revision = revision;
00348     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00349   }
00350   catch (Exception &e) {
00351     HT_ERRORF("Problem writing commit log: %s: %s",
00352               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00353     error = e.code();
00354   }
00355 
00356   return error;
00357 }

00359 
00360 void CommitLog::load_fragment_priority_map(LogFragmentPriorityMap &frag_map) {
00361   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00362   uint64_t cumulative_total = m_cur_fragment_length;
00363   uint32_t distance = 0;
00364   LogFragmentPriorityData frag_data;
00365 
00366   if (m_latest_revision != 0) {
00367     frag_data.distance = distance++;
00368     frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00369     frag_map[m_latest_revision] = frag_data;
00370   }
00371 
00372   for (std::deque<CommitLogFileInfo>::reverse_iterator iter
00373        = m_fragment_queue.rbegin(); iter != m_fragment_queue.rend(); ++iter) {
00374     cumulative_total += (*iter).size;
00375     frag_data.distance = distance++;
00376     frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00377     frag_map[(*iter).revision] = frag_data;
00378   }
00379 }
